Compiling AbbyScap3 .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:276: cannot find symbol symbol : method hasPlayerItem(net.com.codeusa.model.Player,int,int) location: class net.com.codeusa.Engine if (Engine.hasPlayerItem(p, 995, 20000000)) { ^ Note: .\net\com\codeusa\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

There isn’t a hasPlayerItem() method either.[/quote]

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

Okay, I am trying to create a Command that gives you items but takes 20M from you’re inventory, I got it working so that it took 20M from you’re inventory but you could do it with 1 GP or even nothing at all and still get the items, if someone solves this problem it will help me with about 20% of my commands.

The command that I’m trying to make work like the stated above is:

			if (cmd[0].equals("foodandpotions")) {
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7061, 100000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2435, 50000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2441, 50000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2437, 50000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2443, 50000);
				p.message("Here's you're Food and Potions.");
			}

I tryed to do it myself several times, what I have now is:

			if (cmd[0].equals("foodandpotions")) {
				if (Engine.playerhasItem(p, 995, 20000000));
				Engine.playerhasItem.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 20000000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7061, 100000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2435, 50000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2441, 50000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2437, 50000);
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 2443, 50000);
				p.message("Here's you're Food and Potions.");
			}

But I get these errors:

Compiling AbbyScap3
.\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:276: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method playerhasItem(net.com.codeusa.model.Player,int,int)
location: class net.com.codeusa.Engine
                                if (Engine.playerhasItem(p, 995, 20000000));
                                          ^
.\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:277: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable playerhasItem
location: class net.com.codeusa.Engine
                                Engine.playerhasItem.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 9
95, 20000000);
                                      ^
Note: .\net\com\codeusa\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Any help would be very appricated.

Read full topic
